context: PayPal was owned by eBay (acquired 2002) and was the dominant online payment method. The company processed $27B in payments in 2005, enabling e-commerce growth.

competitors.name: Credit Cards
competitors.notes: Visa, Mastercard, Amex for online payments

competitors.name: Google Checkout
competitors.notes: Google's payment service competing with PayPal

competitors.name: Bill Me Later
competitors.notes: Buy now pay later service later acquired by PayPal
